> I wouldn't put any money on it coming out, at least not under that 
> name. However, maybe OpenGlad-E will have the hi-res graphics.

Matter of fact, it does. The CVS version (developer version) of
Openglad-e is currently using targa graphic files with double the
resolution of the older graphic files. This gives you a lot more
pixels to play with which results in lot nicer graphics, as long as
there are people willing to improve them.

-sean
